EXAMPLES

Hover over the images to look at a few illustrations of our work.

Jolly Nature

Tackles various life situations with utmost grace.

skittish nature

Gets easily frightened , and excited at the same time.

Overanalyzer

Gives multiple thoughts to everything and gets worried easily .

enthusiastic nature

always enthusiastic to encounter new situations

Ecstatic nature

Is always jolly and tries putting smile on others face

lively nature

always active and never gets tired

Emotional nature

Gets easily hurt by people and then overthinks.

frustrated nature

gets easily agitated by things and people

overwhelmed nature

gets easily affected by people and feels overwhelmed
